```
import Data.List
big = [1..10000000]
sum' = foldl' (+) 0
average xs = fromIntegral (sum' xs) / fromIntegral (length xs)
main = print (average big)

```

```
import Data.List
import Control.Parallel
big = [1..10000000]
sum' = foldl' (+) 0
average' xs =
    let s = sum' xs
        l = length xs
    in s `par` l `par` fromIntegral s / fromIntegral l
main = print (average big)

```
